check.name: Online Resource Function
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Online Resource Function concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept OnlineResourceFunction is present."
if(OnlineResourceFunction is not None and len(str(OnlineResourceFunction)) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "OnlineResourceFunction concept is not present"
return False

dialect.name: Dryad Data Package and Data File Modules
ISO 19115 and ISO 19115-2 / ISO 19139 and ISO 19139-2
